profile.title: Hmanrua Profile
profile.mustLogin: Setting hmu theih nan i lo signin vek a ngai.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Thumal hmasa leh ṭawng thar anṭhem
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Thumal hmasa leh ṭawng thar an lo telin langh
profile.filterExplicit: Inthup theih lo zawng zawng ṭhinna
profile.saveError: Thiltihtheih lo: Setting a la sak thei lo
profile.noPrivateKey: Hei device ah private key awm lo. Export theih lo.
profile.setBackupPassword: I backup chungah ziahna (password) siam rawh:
profile.enterBackupPassword: He backup hian ziahna chu ṭha rawh:
profile.importSuccess: Private key hei device ah a import ta.
profile.importFailed: Key import a lêm (ziahna dik lo emaw file tihsual).
profile.keysRotated: Key pair thar siam a ni a, public key a upload ta.
profile.keyDisclaimer: I private key hi device aṭang khân a la kal lo vang. A hnuaia ziahna hmangin copy export la, a dang device a lo chhuahsan theihna tûra.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Free a ni—Sun/Moon enkawlna danglamna te chauh a awm. Theme tam zawk atan Upgrade la.
profile.backupDesc: Key-te password-in enkawlhin backup siam la, a dang device-ah restore nghâl thei tûr.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Message-te aṭanga blur a ni mek (default)
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: App a unfocus ni chuan blur rawh
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ka message copy ni ang che kha min hriat rawh
profile.followHint: An thawnthu (status) chu Followers (emaw Public) audience hmangin an post a nih chuan i Following feed-ah an lang ang.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: He section ah thil tihsual a awm.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Inṭanpui call leh text-te chu i hriatthiam phone emaw email-ah forward rawh. I chhuah dan call/text-ah chuan i Chatforia number chu a lang thei.

chat.selectPrompt: Text emaw chat room kha thlang la, inṭanpui hman rawh
chat.emptySubtitle: Message ziah la chat chu a hruai rawh.

status.maxTooltip: 7 ni (days) chu tam ber a ni
status.filesNote: File 5 vel thleng. A dâna 24 h an ni ṭhin.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Settings zir tûrin log in rawh.

premium.heading: Go Premium
premium.description: Hmanrua ṭha zawk te hmu & ad-te paihawm rawh.

auth.headline: Hrilhchhuah theih, hnam zâwl inṭanpui—ṭawngṭhin an lo ni
auth.description: End-to-end encryption, AI-ṭhinna, disappearing messages, leh voice/video call a awm.

feature.privacy: Privacy-a nghâk. I data hi i chhandamna.

auth.desktopTip: Desktop-ah nge? Phone hmangin scan la app dawn rawh.

headlineAlt.main: Hriat thiam leh ngaihdam zawng zawng a nei
headlineAlt.highlight: i ṭawng a chhiar theih ang

auth.subhead: Private, encrypted, a ṭawngṭhin inṭanpui — khân khânin.
auth.tip: Chatforia chu device dang zawng zawng ah i hmang thei — app dawn chuan a ṭha zawk e.
auth.scanHint: App dawn tûra scan rawh emaw browser-ah hawng.

footer.doNotSell: Ka thil hlui chu min beih lo rawh

home.title: Home
home.subheader: Message ziah la chat hruai rawh.
home.sendTooltipEmpty: Message ziak chuan thawn thei ang

press.title: Press
press.contact: Media chungchangin, hei hian min biak rawh: press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Media chungchangin, press@chatforia.com-ah min biak rawh.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia chu security a nei bawk, translation danglam zet leh E2E encryption nei a ni a, hnam zâwl inṭanpui kha a fel theih tûrin a siam a ni.
press.assetsText: Logo, screenshot leh product thilthlâwm (kal tawh chiah).

careers.title: Careers
careers.intro: Kan team a chhimchhiah zâwk a, hnam zâwl, private messenger siam hi kan thawk a ni. Encryption, accessibility leh UX ṭhin a hmangaih em ni? Chutiang chuan i thawn teh.
careers.openRoles: Open roles: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: Eng emaw eng: I resume/link-te chu jobs@chatforia.com-ah thawn rawh.

about.title: Chatforia chungchâng
about.description: Chatforia chu hnam zâwl, thilsiamna nei messenger a ni a; end-to-end encryption, ṭawngṭhin danglamna, leh voice/video call a tel. Kan thu a pawimawh chu: mimalte an inṭanpui theih thei—him leh ṭawng kaih lo, hnam zâwl pawh an zung zung.

values.control: Control: Disappearing messages & read receipts chu optional.

about.howDescription: I device aṭang chuan message-te a encrypt zawng zawng a ni. Translation, backup leh device sync pawh kan server hriatna remchânna (minimize) a nih tûrin a lo siam.

advertise.title: Chatforia-ah Advertise rawh
advertise.description: Messaging hmangtute an hmu ṭhinna aṭangin, ti theih dân ṭha takin i inkhâwm thei ang. Kan hnathawh a ni display banner, sponsorships, leh house promo. Premium dawngtute chuan ad an hmu lo.

adsense.withPubId: Tuna kan ad chu Google AdSense hmangin kan thawn a ni. Google Ads-ah i tih theih chuan publisher ID {{pubId}} hmang la unit-te han ziah chhuak rawh. Sponsorship pawh a awm—form hmang rawh.
adsense.noPubId: Tuna kan ad chu Google AdSense hmangin kan thawn a ni. Sponsorship direct pawh a awm—form hnuaia pe rawh.

advertise.noPlacements: Placement siamna awm lo. ads/placements.js-ah dawng rawh.

why.highSession: Chat UI-ah session ṭha leh hun a lo nghâl ṭhin
why.brandSafe: Brand-safe format; frequency capping a chhun
why.sponsoredMoments: “Start a Chat” modal ang chi (sponsored moments) a awm
why.deals: Direct deal emaw AdSense/Google Ads programmatic

form.submittedMsg: Thil i pe ta. Kan inṭanpui khân chuan kan lo thawn ang.
form.missingRequired: Name, email, message te tarlang rawh.
form.successToast: Thil i pe ta! Kan inṭanpui hun rei loh a ni ang.
form.mailtoInfo: I email client kha min hawng mek…
form.messagePlaceholder: Targeting, hun, KPI, placement duhthlanna, etc.

legal.disclaimerStart: I dahna hi kan hriat a, i lo tum a ni

upgrade.title: Upgrade
upgrade.subtitle: I duh ang zawng plan thlang rawh: Plus hmang chuan ad-te a paihawm, Premium hmang chuan power feature zawng zawng a hmu.

scheduleBanner.title: Subscription a tawp dâwn
scheduleBanner.body: He ni atangin i Free a lo ni leh ang

free.title: Free
free.ctaUnavailable: Free-ah kal leh (a la hman theih lo)

features.sameFeatures: Monthly ang khân feature a ṭang

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.subtitle: Chatforia-ah thar zawng zawng tan—hêng hian hmanrua pawimawh berte chu min zirtîr ang a, m'mins a tawp lo.

alert.text: Kan feature thar an lo awm chuan he guide hi kan siam chhun vek ang. Eng mah a awm lo a nih chuan min hrilhfiah rawh via

section1.title: 1) I account siam rawh
section1.loginText: i account a la awm tawh chuan.

section2.title: 2) Message hruai rawh
section2.item1: DM emaw Group siam la message a hruai rawh.
section2.item2: Instant translation hmangin 100+ ṭawng inṭanpui ang che.
section2.item3: Profile → Privacy-ah disappearing messages leh read receipts en rawh.

section3.title: 3) Aṭanga lo kal rawh
section3.item1Part2: page-ah ṭhiar rawh (Plus = ad-lo, Premium = power feature zawng zawng).
section3.item2Part1: Device dang link la backup encrypted siam a

account.q: Engtin nge account ka siam theih/emaw ka dawn leh theih?
account.a: App dawn emaw web hmang la, “Create account” ti la email/phone i hriatthiam rawh. Dawn leh tûrin “Forgot password” hmang rawh.

privacy.q: Message-te hi end-to-end a encrypt em?
privacy.a: A ni. Message leh call-te chu end-to-end a encrypt zâng a ni. Nangni leh dawngtute chauh an chhiar theih.

translate.q: Instant translation engtin nge a kal?
translate.a: Settings → Appearance & Language-ah “Auto-translate” la hman rawh. Device-ah ṭhin theih a ni chuan a theihna kan hman, vawiin saktu API hmang ngai a nih chuan metadata tam tak kan la hmu lo ang.

contact.a: support@chatforia.com-ah min thawn rawh. Screenshot leh app version tel rawh.

contact.title: Min biak rawh
contact.successMsg: Lawm e—kan team chuan emailin min thawn ang.
contact.errorSend: Thawn theih lo. support@chatforia.com-ah email rawh.

intro.body: He Privacy Policy hian Chatforia (“kan”, “kanni”) hi i app leh kan hnathawh hmanga in hman ṭhin chungchâng—engtin nge infomation kan khâr leh kan hman tih a thlir chhuak a ni. Chatforia chu kan lo kalpui dan aṭanga data i lang thiam thiamna chu kan la târ lang fo loh nân kan inthlang a ni.

infoWeCollect.title: Kan khâr ṭhin
infoWeCollect.account: Account chungchâng (e.g., email/phone) i account siam leh chhawrâwng tûra.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted content (message/call) chu end-to-end a encrypt a ni; kan chhiar theih lo.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/usage ang chi—crash log, device type, a chungchang analytics hlauhawm lo—performance ṭha tûra.

howWeUse.title: Engtin nge kan hmang
howWeUse.provide: Hnathawh siam leh chhawrâwng (auth, spam/abuse detection).
howWeUse.improve: Feature ṭha zâwk (translation ṭha zâwk, reliability).
howWeUse.legal: Danah ṭhenkhat a lo thlen chuan a zawh tûra.

sharing.title: Dâltu leh pêkna
sharing.body: Kan personal data kan beih lo. Processor-te (e.g., push notification, analytics) nen contract ṭha takin data tam tak kan pêk thei.

rights.title: I dikna
rights.body: I vênhimna (e.g., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA) angin, i data chu i en leh, ṭhaṭa ṭhaṭa i thleng theih, thim theih, emaw a khâwmna te i tlâk theih a ni. privacy@chatforia.com-ah min hrilh rawh.

retention.title: Data innghahna & security
retention.body: Service kal zêl tûra a pawimawh chauh kan innghah a, security standard chuan kan hman. E2E content chu kan decrypt theih lo.

children.title: Hriatpuite
children.body: Chatforia hi 13 chhung (emaw i ṭawngdang leh danin a ngai a nih chuan) hminga naupangte an ni lo tûr.

changes.title: Thar siam
changes.body: Heng page-ah kan châng thar a ni chuan kan dah leh ang a, “Châng thar” ni pawh kan thlâk leh ang.

intro.body: Chatforia i hmang dân chuan he Terms-te i hmantîr a ni. I lo pawm loh chuan, hman suh.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Thil dik tak pe leh credential chhawrâwng rawh.
accounts.itemResponsibility: I account hmang dân hrang hrangah chuan i hnathawh i hriat chhoh a ngai.

acceptableUse.title: Hman theih dân
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Dan tawh lo, hnehna/nunna awm loh, tihhlum emaw spam/automation hnathawh lo.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Kan dan tawh lo chuan kan suspend/terminate thei.

yourContent.title: I content
yourContent.body: I content chungchângah i thuneihna i nei zêl. Service kalpui tûra (e.g., routing, storage, translation) tih a ngai thil te chu kan hman theih nân i min pe vek ang.

disclaimer.title: Hrilhchiahna & hnathawh chungchâng
disclaimer.body: Service chu “as is” a ni a, thil ṭha zawk tihna a awm lo. Danin kan tih theih ber aṭang khân, Chatforia chu chutiang thil tihhlum zawng zawngah innghatna a awm lo.

changes.title: Thar siam
changes.body: He terms kan thlak thei; thlakna hnu a hman zêl chuan i pawm a ni tih a kâwk.

doNotSell.title: Ka Thil Hluite min beih suh/Min pêk suh
doNotSell.body: Chatforia chuan personal information kan beih lo. California mi zawng zawng chuan CPRA hnuaiah an dil theih a ni—button hnuaiah.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.body: Chatforia chuan cookie tam tak kan hman lo (e.g., session, security). Third-party ads cookie kan hman lo. I browser setting hmanga i manage thei.
